level.heading: Taking property without right.
level.text: A person commits the offense of taking property without right if that person takes and carries away the property of another without right to do so. A person convicted of taking property without right shall be fined not more than $300 or imprisoned for not more than 90 days, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-164, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 22-3201.
